channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20039] Bucket pruning: Left Outer Join on bucketed table gives wrong result
item.description:
Left outer join on bucketed table on certain cases gives wrong results.

Depending on the order in which the table-scans are walked through, the FilterPruner might end up using the wrong table scan's table properties on the other table.
item.summary: Bucket pruning: Left Outer Join on bucketed table gives wrong result

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
